name: European Cancer Patient Coalition
membership: EPPOSI; EUnetHTA; European Health Policy Forum; EFPIA Think Tank; UICC
goal:
Anticipating and participating in the legislative and policy changes taking place at EU level (EU Parliament and European Commission);
Raising awareness about initiatives affecting cancer patients;
Providing decision makers with a first-hand patient experience.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
* Health Technology Assessment
* Access to Medicines
* Adaptive Pathways
